dimensions:
H x diam. (bowl and lid together): 14.9 x 9.2 cm (5 7/8 x 3 5/8 in.)
H x diam. (bowl): 7.8 x 9.1 cm (3 1/16 x 3 9/16 in.)
H x diam. (lid): 7.1 x 9.2 cm (2 13/16 x 3 5/8 in.)
title: Sugar bowl and lid
provenance: From the collection of Eleanor G. Hewitt
description: Cylindrical, high domed lid with finial in the form of a draped female figure; basket-weave texture sides and lid.
name: Sugar bowl and lid
